topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a5e8a16368723963000357#post_55a5e8a16368723963000357
I disagree, cause in California if you ever have had sex before your 18th birthday you're labelled a predator regardless.

It's one of the reasons why the sex offender list is falling to pieces cause there's so many people on the list who just had sex before they were 18 that it literally can't function budget wise.

My personal opinion on that is 16 + 4 year age difference cause the whole "oh you had sex before you're 18 even though your girlfriend is only 1 day older than you so we're going to slap you on the list" is kind of retarded (metaphorically)
